resources.string: Math is a subject that involves a lot of numbers. And sometimes letters. You calculate stuff. Yeah!
Physics is all about gravity and forces and movement or whatever. And light I guess? I don\'t know, don\'t ask me. I never took Physics in college!
Marvel superheroes are fictional characters that have super powers and fight crime and do other cool stuff. My favorite Marvel superhero is Miss Marvel! Also Spidergwen. Also Miles Morales. Yee.
Download \'But You Seem Fine\' from the Google Play Store!!
Correct answer: Download \'But You Seem Fine\' from the Google Play Store!!
